3cacfd5b-7060-4d07-a290-9e25d84bb054.name: Oxygen Storage
3cacfd5b-7060-4d07-a290-9e25d84bb054.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

6cf70cce-c981-4069-bdd7-b4d034ff9f0c.name: Oxygen Storage
6cf70cce-c981-4069-bdd7-b4d034ff9f0c.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

431955bb-e7b4-46c4-b4d9-6bcc75eca312.name: Oxygen Storage
431955bb-e7b4-46c4-b4d9-6bcc75eca312.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

9e9e8847-2575-4e23-a47a-ed652cf85008.name: Oxygen Storage
9e9e8847-2575-4e23-a47a-ed652cf85008.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

874be6a1-eccf-4f46-b8e6-d23554d5c074.name: Oxygen Storage
874be6a1-eccf-4f46-b8e6-d23554d5c074.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

3d204fea-e866-44a2-93a3-5e394780a2c3.name: Flight
3d204fea-e866-44a2-93a3-5e394780a2c3.notes: Air Move is Basic Speed x 2 (drop all fractions)

b2b22adc-6657-45a6-a66e-f910dcbe4633.name: Diffuse
b2b22adc-6657-45a6-a66e-f910dcbe4633.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

949d7b8d-91a9-426c-9cf1-c19e75541052.name: Homogenous
949d7b8d-91a9-426c-9cf1-c19e75541052.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

75e78bd3-e6c8-454a-bd48-de92683df089.name: No Blood
75e78bd3-e6c8-454a-bd48-de92683df089.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

061989a8-c135-4f99-896e-e7fdbd1f640d.name: No Brain
061989a8-c135-4f99-896e-e7fdbd1f640d.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

3a3b6fb2-242b-4a60-9eb0-6925b64982da.name: No Eyes
3a3b6fb2-242b-4a60-9eb0-6925b64982da.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

20dabf36-3bf6-48b7-9c2e-24126ee58062.name: No Head
20dabf36-3bf6-48b7-9c2e-24126ee58062.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

3327b2a0-9c06-48e2-af8c-0a1cd1371689.name: No Neck
3327b2a0-9c06-48e2-af8c-0a1cd1371689.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

948343c4-d56e-4b24-970e-606f1ee628af.name: No Vitals
948343c4-d56e-4b24-970e-606f1ee628af.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

e284f77d-8f2d-41d5-8099-169bf1535b9b.name: Unliving
e284f77d-8f2d-41d5-8099-169bf1535b9b.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
